title: ECharts visualMap component
description: visualMap component config. Use as top-level key in ECharts option.

seriesIndex.description:
'all' or null/undefined: all series.
A number or an array of number: the specified series.
set min: 0, max: 200, only for campatible with ec2.
In fact min max should not have default value.

min.description: min value, must specified if pieces is not specified.

max.description: max value, must specified if pieces is not specified.

inRange.description: Visual configuration for the data in selection. Props: symbol, color, opacity, decal, symbolSize, colorAlpha, colorLightness, colorSaturation, colorHue, liftZ

outOfRange.description: Visual configuration for the out of selection. Props: symbol, color, opacity, decal, symbolSize, colorAlpha, colorLightness, colorSaturation, colorHue, liftZ

itemWidth.description:
Width of the display item
When put the controller vertically, it is the length of
horizontal side of each item. Otherwise, vertical side.
When put the controller vertically, it is the length of
vertical side of each item. Otherwise, horizontal side.

padding.description: Padding of the component. Can be an array similar to CSS

text.description: Text on the both end. Such as ['High', 'Low']

textStyle.description: Props: show, position, distance, rotate, offset, minMargin, overflow, ellipsis, silent, precision, valueAnimation, rich, color, fontStyle, fontWeight, fontFamily, fontSize, align, verticalAlign, baseline, opacity, lineHeight, backgroundColor, borderColor, borderWidth, borderType, borderDashOffset, borderRadius, padding, width, height, textBorderColor, textBorderWidth, textBorderType, textBorderDashOffset, textShadowBlur, textShadowColor, textShadowOffsetX, textShadowOffsetY, tag, shadowBlur, shadowColor, shadowOffsetX, shadowOffsetY

categories.description:
category names, like: ['some1', 'some2', 'some3'].
Attr min/max are ignored when categories set. See "Order Rule"
